attributes.action: Raise the minimum tax allowance to £12,000 and alter all others rather than granting people tax credits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By granting tax credits to people the Government have acknowledged that you cannot live on a low wage.  Raise the lower tax allowance so no-one pays tax unless they earn more than £12,000 then pay 20% on anything between £12,000 and £20,000. 25% on up to £30,000 30% on anything up to £40,000 and 50% on anything over £40,000.  I would rather be a little worse off and earn my own money than have a little extra with the trouble of admin, mistakes etc. People should not be allowed to work just 16 hours per week and have a partner sat at home working nothing and be able to claim £600 per month for free.  An extreme case I know but it happens more the more people are aware they can do it!  Please support this and get the work ethic back to Britain.
